mapper.select: select UID,phone,mail,type,register_time,wechat_id,password from account where (UID=#{param1} or mail=#{param1} or phone=#{param1} or mail=#{param1}) and type = #{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into account (UID, password, phone, mail, type, register_time, wechat_id) VALUES (#{UID}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{type}, #{registerTime}, #{wechatId})
mapper.update: update account set password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, mail=#{mail}, type=#{type}, register_time=#{registerTime}, wechat_id=#{wechatId} where UID = #{UID}
update account set password=#{param2} where password=#{param1} and UID=#{param3}
